    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    App
    The main class that starts the chess game.
    ChessBoard
     
    ChessMatch
    Represents a chess match, storing the game's state, including screenshots of the board and movement states.
    Engine
    Represents the main engine for the chess game, handling game logic, state transitions, move validation, and communication with the GUI.
    GameGUI
    Manages the graphical user interface (GUI) for the chess game.
    GamePanel
    Represents the game panel in the chess GUI.
    MenuPanel
    A panel that represents the main menu of the chess game.
    Move
    A helper class for the GameEngine that represents a move on the chessboard.
    MoveListener
    The MoveListener class is responsible for handling user input for making moves in the chess game.
    NavigationListener
    The NavigationListener class listens for user actions such as button clicks in the menu and navigates between different panels in the application by updating the CardLayout of the JFrame.
    Piece
    The Piece class represents a chess piece on the board.
    RulesPanel
    The RulesPanel class represents a panel that displays the rules of chess.
